00019 #ifndef XAPIAN_INCLUDED_VISIBILITY_H
00020 #define XAPIAN_INCLUDED_VISIBILITY_H
00021 
00022 #if defined __GNUC__ && (__GNUC__ >= 4) && !defined XAPIAN_DISABLE_VISIBILITY
00023 // GCC 3.4 has visibility support, but it's a bit buggy so we require 4.0.
00024 # define XAPIAN_VISIBILITY_DEFAULT __attribute__((visibility("default")))
00025 #else
00026 # define XAPIAN_VISIBILITY_DEFAULT
00027 #endif
00028 
00029 #endif
